Package com.polytech.SocialBucket.UI

Class FXRouter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.polytech.SocialBucket.UI.FXRouter
  • public final class FXRouter
extends Object
    FXRouter allows to manage scenes switching on JavaFX Application with an easy API Inspired by Angular JS $routeProvider
    Version:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Marco Trombino
